extension.summary: Unofficial Spotify music plugin for Kodi
extension.description: Allows you to use your Spotify premium account to connect and play Spotify through Kodi. After installing, use 'Configure' to enter your Spotify username and password.
extension.disclaimer: This product uses the SPOTIFY WEB API but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trade mark of Spotify AB.
extension.news: v1.2.4 (2022-07-17) [new] The Unofficial Spotify for Kodi add-on by Marcelveldt is now working for Kodi 19 and 20. Thanks to Ldsz, Elkropac, and FernetMenta for getting it to work with Python 3.9. Code cleanup and general add-on cleaning by Glk1001. Tested and working with Kodi 19 and 20 on Ubuntu 21.10. [issue] Does not work with Python 3.10 (and therefore Ubuntu 22.04) - problem with 3.10 and sqlite3.
